extension_description.message: Enjoy extended browser protection with ESET Browser Privacy & Security.

summary_search_stats_text.message: Check the safety of the search results.

secure_search_subheader.message: See which search results are safe to open.

scan_search_result_func_description.message: Scan search results to see which ones are safe to click on.

metadata_cleaner_subheader.message: Remove metadata with private information when sharing files online.

metadata_cleaner_func_description.message: Clean metadata every time you upload an image.

browser_restart_needed_p.message: A browser restart is needed for this change to take effect.

browsing_cleanup_header_text.message: Delete browsing data or set up regular cleanups. Stay logged in on selected websites by adding them to a list.

browsing_regular_cleanup_header_descript.message: Select the cleanup frequency and the types of data to include.

browsing_cleanup_private_data_descriptio.message: Private data type includes your browsing history, download history, cookies and website data, form autofill data and service workers.

browsing_cleanup_custom_data_option_1_to.message: Records of the websites you've visited, including dates and times. Deleting this data will erase your web activity history from your device.

browsing_cleanup_custom_data_option_2_to.message: A list of files you've downloaded. Deleting this data will remove the record of downloaded files but not the files themselves.

browsing_cleanup_custom_data_option_3_to.message: Small files stored by websites to remember your preferences, login status, and activity. Deleting cookies may log you out of websites and reset your preferences.

browsing_cleanup_custom_data_option_4_to.message: Temporary files that help load websites faster by storing parts of them on your device. Deleting this data might slow down page loading initially, but you'll free up space.

browsing_cleanup_custom_data_option_5_to.message: Stored login information for websites, which allows for quick logins. Deleting this data will permanently remove all remembered usernames and passwords, so please proceed with caution.

browsing_cleanup_custom_data_option_6_to.message: Information you've entered in forms, such as names, addresses, and contact details, that helps you fill out forms faster. Deleting this data will remove your saved information.

browsing_cleanup_custom_data_option_7_to.message: Files that help websites and web apps run smoothly, even when you're offline. Deleting this data might affect features like offline access, background syncing, and notifications, but most websites will still work as usual.

browsing_cleanup_custom_data_option_5_no.message: This will permanently delete all remembered usernames and passwords.

browsing_regular_cleanup_func_disabled.message: After enabling regular cleanup, set your preferred time and frequency.

browsing_regular_cleanup_func_not_set.message: You haven't set up regular cleanup yet.

browsing_regular_cleanup_func_next_time_.message: The next cleanup is scheduled for %DATE% at %TIME%.

browsing_regular_cleanup_func_next_sessi.message: The next cleanup will automatically start the next time you open your browser.

settings_page_browser_cleanup_descriptio.message: Add websites where you want to accept cookies and remain logged in even after performing browser cleanup.

settings_page_browser_cleanup_input_plac.message: Enter a URL you would like to add

settings_page_browser_cleanup_checkbox_t.message: Keep current browsing session for open tabs after cleanup

settings_page_browser_cleanup_active_tab.message: Suggested domains based on the tabs you currently have open in your browser. If you don't see all currently open tabs in the list below, refresh the list.

settings_page_website_settings_descripti.message: Easily access and manage website permissions to control what information websites can use.

settings_page_website_settings_notif_sec.message: Review which websites can ask to send notifications.

settings_page_website_settings_location_.message: Review which websites can ask for your location.

settings_page_website_settings_camera_se.message: Review which websites can ask to use your camera.

settings_page_website_settings_mic_secti.message: Review which websites can ask to use your microphone.

settings_page_website_settings_chrome_ex.message: We can't change settings for browser extensions. To adjust the settings for a specific browser extension, go to your browser's Privacy and security section

settings_page_website_settings_edge_exte.message: We can't change settings for browser extensions. To adjust the settings for a specific browser extension, go to your browser's Cookies and site permissions section

settings_page_appearance_description.message: Customize the color of the interface to suit your preference. You can choose between a light or dark color.

welcome_page_chrome_info_tile_text.message: Keep the extension visible by clicking the extension icon above and pinning it in the browser for easy access.

welcome_page_edge_info_tile_text.message: Keep the extension visible by clicking the extension icon above and adding it to the browser's toolbar for easy access.

welcome_page_header_text.message: Thank you for enabling the ESET Browser Privacy & Security extension in your browser

welcome_page_subheader.message: To start enjoying a more secure browsing experience, click the extension icon next to the address bar. In some browsers, it may be hidden in the browser menu.

welcome_page_secure_search_tile_text.message: Check the safety of search results before opening them.

welcome_page_browser_cleanup_tile_text.message: Delete browsing data or set up a regular cleanup.

welcome_page_metadata_cleanup_tile_text.message: Strip files of private information when sharing them online.

welcome_page_website_settings_tile_text.message: Control website permissions for notifications, location, camera and microphone.

alert_page_connection_lost_text.message: The connection between {%productname%} and the browser extension has been lost. Please check your internet connection and try again. Note that the extension won't work without {%productname%} installed.

alert_page_expired_license_text.message: Your subscription has expired, and you can no longer access the ESET Browser Privacy & Security extension. To resolve this issue, please open {%productname%} and follow the instructions provided.

alert_page_unsupported_browser_text_1.message: It appears you're using a browser we do not yet support. To use the ESET Browser Privacy & Security extension, please install a supported browser.

alert_page_missing_product_text_1.message: There's currently no ESET product installed on your computer that supports the ESET Browser Privacy & Security extension.

alert_page_missing_product_text_2.message: To learn more about the extension, supported ESET products, supported browsers and installation, visit our Online help.

settings_page_not_valid_url_warning.message: *That doesn't look like a valid URL.
